name: Balance Bliss
description:
Balance Bliss is a soothing and meditative game that will guide you through a calming journey of balance and equilibrium. With its minimalistic aesthetic and gentle soundtrack, you'll be transported to a peaceful world of relaxation and focus. The gameplay is simple and intuitive - use two sliders to move the board and guide a ball through a maze to reach a spot. There's no way to lose, so you can take your time and enjoy the journey. With 20 levels to explore and no time limits, you can play at your own pace and return to the game whenever you need a moment of calm. Come experience the blissful balance of Balance Bliss.
Please note that this version is adapted for web testing purposes only. The game is designed for mobile devices with a Portrait orientation.
